quote: If you're a listing agent and you don't want to get fired, be proactive, right? And don't call a foundation repair company.
why_clipworthy: This advice challenges conventional practices and offers a specific action to protect one's business.
suggested_hook: Why calling the wrong expert could cost you your listing.

quote: Clay soil can be cyclical. It can expand and contract... and have all kinds of problems.
why_clipworthy: This reveals a common but often overlooked issue that can affect property value.
suggested_hook: The hidden danger lurking beneath your property.
